snippet: Atlanta’s Kyle Korver has made at least one 3-pointer in 70 straight games, fourth most in league history. His 45.5 percent accuracy is second in the N.B.A.
abstract: Atlanta Hawks shooting guard Kyle Korver has made at least one 3-pointer in 70 straight games, fourth most in league history; his 45.5 percent accuracy is second in NBA.
lead_paragraph: Atlanta’s Kyle Korver has made at least one 3-pointer in 70 straight games, fourth most in league history. His 45.5 percent accuracy is second in the N.B.A.

headline.seo: Hawks’ Kyle Korver Takes a Low-Key Approach to 3-Point Streak
headline.main: Chasing a Record but Taking a Low-Key Approach
headline.print_headline: Chasing a Record but Taking a Low-Key Approach
